2017-2019: Horizon 2020: “Youth, Inequality, and Political Participation in the EU”. Principal investigator for Italy in a consortium of six European Universities (€ 2.4million). [Final round but not awarded]

2017-2021: European Research Council Consolidator Grant: Project: “Quantitative Subjective Expectations and Support for National and European Union Governments” (€ 1.9million). Principal Investigator [Not awarded]

2016: VisitINPS Scholars Program for the project “Expectations of Job Instability, Job Insecurity and Earnings Risk of the Italian Skilled Unemployed: Patterns and Impact on Behavior” Co-investigator joint with Chiara Binelli (Center for Research and Social Progress) (€ 6,000). [Awarded]

2017-2018: ESRC Secondary Data Analysis Initiative (SDAI):“Politicizing Perceptions: UK Citizens’ Perceptions of Income and Support for UK and European Union Governance” with Kathryn Simpson (University of Manchester: £198,291). [In final round, under review]

Risultati ottenuti nel trasferimento tec.content: Co-Founder and Co-Director of Center for Research and Social Progress. An international, multi-disciplinary, non-profit research center in Italy (Agenzia delle Entrate: Codice Fiscale: 91113010333). Founded in Sept 2015
